mapper.select: SELECT * FROM domain_events WHERE status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY create_time ASC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE domain_events SET status = 'PROCESSING', retry_count = retry_count + 1, error_message = NULL, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 'PENDING'
UPDATE domain_events SET status = 'PUBLISHED', error_message = NULL, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 'PROCESSING'
UPDATE domain_events SET status = 'PENDING', error_message = #{errorMessage}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 'PROCESSING'
UPDATE domain_events SET status = 'FAILED', error_message = #{errorMessage}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 'PROCESSING'
